== Gonsua (626894) ==
      
Gonsua is a village in the [[Salcete]] taluka of [[South Goa]] district with an area of 47 hectares and harbouring 50 households with total population of 222 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[MARGAO]] is at a distance of 10 km. Male population is 108 and female population is 114. Scheduled Caste Population is 4 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 626894<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
